text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And here's undefeated Triple Crown<n>hopeful Mihono
Bourbon, making her<n>appearance at Kyoto Racecourse!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon! Show us the birth of<n>a Triple Crown
legend!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We believe in you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower versus Mihono Bourbon.<n>This Kikuka Sho will
settle their rivalry<n>once and for all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Just keep following Bourbon... Just<n>keep following... Just
follow, and<n>then...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower... I see you already have<n>me marked.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No matter. I will be first across the<n>finish.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Not today. I won't lose again.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Rice! You got this!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
The Kikuka Sho. 3,000 meters on turf.<n>Long distance is
Rice's strength,<n>which means she has a chance,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but there's no way Bourbon<n>doesn't have something
up her<n>sleeve.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey Trainer, what'd you tell Rice?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I told her to keep following Bourbon,<n>then pass her.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh... Wait, that's it?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hard to find fault with that advice. Her<n>ability to stalk a
leader is second to<n>none.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...If anything, I'm less concernedabout if she can beat Bourbon,and more about how the crowd will—

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen is cut off by another tidal<n>wave of cheers. It's
almost time.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The crowning glory of the Classics is<n>on the line here in the
Kikuka Sho. And<n>it all starts now!
